nodes.text: The Barrckli were a group known in the galaxy. In 0 BBY, a Barrckli was present on the Outer Rim planet Darkknell. While at the Continuum Void cantina, the individual was in a drunken state and had to be dodged by Moranda Savich, a professional con artist who was being pursued by CorSec agent Valin Horn.
A Barrckli appeared in the short story Interlude at Darkknell, part of the Tales from the New Republic anthology, published by Del Rey in 1999. The story gives no indication as to what a Barrckli is.
